query:
query ViewerQuery {
  viewer {
    __typename
    id
    allowEmailAddressSharingEditorWriter
    dismissableFlags
    emailObfuscated
    geolocation {
      country
      __typename
    }
    hasGroupGiftingEnabled
    hasPastMemberships
    hasSubdomain
    imageId
    isEligibleToImportEmails
    isEligibleToViewNewResponses
    isMembershipTrialEligible
    isSuspended
    membership {
      id
      tier
      memberSince
      friendSince
      __typename
    }
    name
    partnerProgramEnrollment {
      id
      status
      __typename
    }
    styleEditorOnboardingVersionSeen
    twitterScreenName
    unverifiedEmail
    username
    viewerEdge {
      id
      createdAt
      __typename
    }
  }
}
